comments.body:
`rocksdb` is not available for Windows, so you need to skip it (or fix the `rocksdb` recipe).
```suggestion
  skip: True  # [win]
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv"
```

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +13,17 @@  number: 0
  skip: True  # [win]
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv"

requirements:
